item.title: About
item.description: Hi ðŸ‘‹ I’m Seb Dalgarno. This is my blog for all things R, fish movement, statistics, data visualization, and various other data/computery things. I’m a PhD student at the UNBC Freshwater Fish Ecology lab. We are using many years of acoustic telemetry data and Bayesian models to make inferences about White Sturgeon movement in the Columbia River. Formerly, I was a computational biologist at Poisson Consulting. Check out my academic and consulting websites for more info.

item.title: Little productivity boosters - git alias
item.description: The problem For years I have staged, committed and pushed changes with the RStudio Git interface. It works! But it can be time-consuming when you are doing it a lot. And I’ve been trying to use my mouse less. It would be better to do this in the terminal. The solution I found this solution on stackoverflow, which suggests staging and committing all files by running the following in the terminal:
